long_description: The waterproof REI Guide gloves combine warmth and good dexterity to keep your hands comfortable when grasping ski poles, ice axes and other mountain gear on your winter adventures. Nylon shells have waterproof, breathable inserts that keep your hands dry while you're skiing, snowboarding and hiking. Synthetic insulation helps keep your hands warm on chilly winter days; high-loft polyester sherpa fleece lines the backs of the gloves for great warmth. Wool blend lining in the palm wicks moisture to keep your hands dry. Durable goatskin leather palms with polyurethane patches give you a secure grip on ski poles, ice axes and other mountain equipment. Low-profile neoprene cuffs with rip-and-stick closures seal tightly around wrists to keep warmth in. Wipe your nose with the soft patches on the thumbs. Clip a carabiner (sold separately) through the loops on the middle fingers to hang the REI Guide gloves from your climbing harness.
